main event: Multiple military personnel reported sighting a round, multicolored UFO over Baffin Island, Canada in December 1957.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round in shape, with an orange and yellow top and a red bottom.
The UFO was capable of hovering without any apparent disturbance.

Military weather personnel stated that weather balloons released from Greenland could have been responsible for the sightings, but the winds on the days in question would have brought the balloons over the sighting area.
Multiple sightings were reported over several days in the same general location.
The sightings were made by experienced military personnel, including a sergeant and several captains.
